summary: Increases the effect of custom enchantments on clothing, so that they are better balanced vs wearing armor
descriptionHtml:
Any custom enchant placed on an item with the keyword \"ArmorClothing\" will have its magnitude increased by 50%.  It will work with mod added clothing as well, as long it has the proper keyword.

This is a modified version of Opaj\'s original work found below.  His version also affects jewelry.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33075/?
author: Opaj and jimmybob

files.name: Better Cloth Enchanting minus jewelry ver1
files.fileName: Better Cloth Enchanting minus jewelry ver1-42930-1-0.rar
